nodes.text: Brendon Lake is a Star Wars fan who participated in the "Join the Jedi" contest sponsored by Hasbro Inc. During the contest, Lake submitted a lightsaber training maneuver known as the "Whirlwind of Destiny." His entry ultimately won the contest and as such, the "Whirlwind of Destiny" was featured as Petro's lightsaber maneuver in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episode "A Test of Strength," with Brendon receiving a screen credit for it.
